title: Processes - Diff Eq Separation of Variables

content.question: Which of the following is the solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of P, with respect to t, plus P, equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> with the initial condition <math alttext="P of 0, equals 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="P equals, negative 1, plus, the square root of 20 t, plus 25, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>20</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P equals, 5 minus, e raised to the negative t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P equals, 10 minus, 6 times e raised to the negative t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P equals, 10 minus, 6 times e to the t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P equals, 10 minus, 6 times e raised to the negative t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
